      • render

        public void render(Context ctx,
                   java.lang.String text,
                   int x,
                   int y,
                   int color,
                   float scale,
                   float alpha)
        Draws a string of text using the bitmap font at a specified location with a color tint, custom glyph scaling and transparency.
        Parameters:
        ctx - The Game render 'canvas'.
        text - The string of message.
        x - x co-ordinate on screen.
        y - y co-ordinate on screen.
        color - Color tint to be applied to each glyph.
        scale - Custom sizing for each glyph.
        alpha - Custom alpha (transparency) to be applied to each glyph.

      • addKerningRule

        public void addKerningRule(java.lang.String glyphs,
                           int glyphWidth,
                           int glyphSink)
        Assigns a spacing rule for a set of glyphs.
        Parameters:
        glyphs - The string of individual affected glyphs
        glyphWidth - Width of affected glyphs
        glyphSink - Sinking of affected glyphs, for letters such as j, q, p

      • addKerningRule

        public void addKerningRule(char c,
                           int glyphWidth,
                           int glyphSink)
        Assigns a spacing rule for a given character.
        Parameters:
        c - Character affected.
        glyphWidth - Width of affected glyphs.
        glyphSink - Sinking of affected glyphs, for letters such as j, q, p.

        public int widthOf(java.lang.String text)

        Returns:
        Width of the given text.

      • widthOf

        public int widthOf(java.lang.String text,
                   float scale)
        Supplies the width of a string using this font at a custom scaling.
        Parameters:
        text - Text used to calculate width.
        scale - Scale at which this string would be hypothetically rendered in.
        Returns:
        The width of a string using this font at a custom scaling.
